alerts.welcomeTenant: Welcome to view operational data for all restaurants under {{name}}
alerts.welcomeSystem: Welcome to Climate Restaurant Management System
alerts.descriptionRestaurant: Here is the detailed operational data for {{name}}, including orders, revenue, carbon reduction and other key indicators.
alerts.descriptionTenant: Here is the aggregated data for all restaurants under {{name}}. You can switch to view data for a specific restaurant in the top right corner.
alerts.descriptionSystem: Here is the system overview, where you can view key business indicators and statistics.

quickAccess.title: Quick Access
quickAccess.description: The system includes the following core functional modules:

modules.certification: Climate Restaurant Certification - Restaurant onboarding, certification application, review process, certificate management
modules.carbon: Carbon Footprint Calculation - Menu carbon footprint calculation, order carbon statistics, carbon label generation and management
modules.traceability: Supply Chain Traceability - Supplier management, ingredient batch tracking, traceability chain construction and display
modules.operation: Restaurant Operations - Order management, points system, operation ledger, behavior statistics
modules.report: Reports & Ecosystem Expansion - Data reports, ESG reports, external interfaces, ecosystem integration

carbonSpecialist.description: Here is the core data for platform carbon data and baseline management, including carbon reduction statistics, baseline data overview and other key indicators.

tooltips.totalRecipes: Total number of recipes available for the restaurant, can be used for menu management. Click to view recipe list.
tooltips.totalCarbonReduction: Total cumulative carbon reduction achieved by the restaurant through providing low-carbon dishes. Click to view carbon footprint data.
tooltips.certifiedRestaurants: Number of restaurants under the current tenant that have obtained Climate Restaurant certification. Click to view certification management.
tooltips.activeUsers: Number of users who placed orders or interacted with the restaurant in the last 30 days
tooltips.todayOrders: Total number of orders today, including completed and in-progress orders. Click to view order management.
tooltips.todayRevenue: Total revenue today, including revenue from completed orders. Click to view operation reports.

empty.noCarbonData: No carbon reduction trend data available

tooltips.totalRestaurants: Total number of restaurants on the platform
tooltips.totalOrders: Total number of orders on the platform
tooltips.totalCarbonReduction: Total carbon reduction of the platform
tooltips.totalUsers: Total number of users on the platform
